HokStack - Stable HELM Chart Repo

Getting Started

HokStack Stable HELM Charts

You can add this repository to your local helm configuration as follows :

$ helm repo add hokstack http://localhost:4000
$ helm repo update

Charts

Hokstack

Home | Source

HokStack Helm chart to Hadoop on Kubernetes

$ helm install hokstack/hokstack --name myrelease --version 1.0.0
Chart Version App Version Date
hokstack-1.0.0 2.6.0 Sun, 26 Apr 2020 16:05:22 +0100
